AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.homeDescription: Building quality projects in Turkey and around the world since 2005
AboutPage.mainTitle: A Brief of Our 15 Years of Success
AboutPage.description: We are a full-service creative digital agency that offers site design, internet marketing, SEO, social media, web and app ui, email marketing, content writing, and web hosting to businesses large and small looking to better communicate their messages.
AboutPage.missionDescription: By generating the most creative, inventive, sustainable, and eco-friendly digital products, we hope to become one of the world's leading developers, publishers, and distributors of interactive entertainment and information services.
AboutPage.teamDescription: Our high-level professionals are also heavily involved in the development and enhancement of the young generation's potential by providing specialized IT training.

ProjectsPage.description: With years of experience and our professional team, we maintain our trusted position in the industry through projects of various scales.

CizelProjects.sectionDescription: With years of experience and expertise, we deliver outstanding projects throughout Turkey. Quality, reliability, and innovation are our priorities in every project.

publicProjects.title: Public Projects
publicProjects.description: Prestigious projects for ministries and public institutions

nationalGardens.title: National Gardens
nationalGardens.description: Social living spaces and recreation projects

home.title: Cizel Construction | Quality and Reliable Construction Services
home.description: As Cizel Construction, we provide reliable solutions in public projects, national gardens and housing projects throughout Turkey with years of experience. Quality, reliability and innovation are our priorities.
home.keywords: cizel construction, construction company, public projects, national gardens, housing projects, construction services, turkey construction, quality construction

about.title: About Us | Cizel Construction - 15 Years of Experience
about.description: As Cizel Construction, we have been providing reliable and quality service in the construction industry since 2010. We are a leader in the sector with 85+ completed projects throughout Turkey.

projects.title: Our Projects | Cizel Construction - Completed and Ongoing Projects
projects.description: Discover our public projects, national gardens and housing projects throughout Turkey. The address of quality and trust with 85+ completed projects.

contact.title: Contact | Cizel Construction - Get in Touch
contact.description: Contact Cizel Construction. You can contact us for professional consultancy and quality construction services for your projects.

career.title: Career | Cizel Construction - Job Opportunities
career.description: Join the Cizel Construction family. Apply for career opportunities in our dynamic team and get the chance to work at the leading company in the sector.

Footer.companyDescription: The construction industry not only builds physical structures but also elevates the quality of life for communities, transforms cities, and is a strategic field that adds value to the future.
